title: Development of Elementary Language Instructional Design Applying Integrated Learning Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Learning Theories and Elementary Language Education Experience
context.additional_context: Process for in-service elementary teachers to explore integrated learning theories applicable in actual classroom settings. Strengthening theory-practice connections through VR-based simulation of diverse instructional scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can design a framework integrating multiple learning theories (constructivism, situated learning, neuroscience-based theories)
Learners can develop and evaluate language lesson scenarios by applying instructional design principles in VR simulation environments
Learners analyze the interaction between self-directed learning processes and instructional design to propose personalized educational strategies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
